2.0.0.name: wordpress/event-post
2.0.0.description:
Add some meta-datas to posts to convert them into full calendar events. Each event can be exported into ical(.ics), outlook(vcs), or Google Calendar. Localization works thanks to openstreetmap.

Date options

  • Begin date-time
  • End date-time
  • Color

Location options

  • Address
  • GPS coordinates

Shortcodes

The plugin comes with two shortcodes wich allows to :

[events_list]

display a list of events

[events_map]

display a map of events

some options are available, such as :

  • nb=$nb (number of post, 0 is all, default: 5)
  • future=$future (boolean, retreive, or not, events in the future, default = 1)
  • past=$past (boolean, retreive, or not, events in the past, default = 0)
  • type=$type (string, possible values are : div, ul, ol default=div | only for [events_list])
  • geo=$geo (boolean, retreives or
